description.value:
Moderate Boon Abadar blesses all your enterprises, leading to financial success as all your ventures always seems to work out.

If you roll a critical failure at a check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Earn Income]{Earn Income}, you get a failure instead.

If you roll a success on a check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Earn Income]{Earn Income}, you earn twice the usual amount of income.
